document.masterDocTitle: Acrotritia species (Acari: Oribatida: Euphthiracaridae) from China with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Acrotritia species (Acari: Oribatida: Euphthiracaridae) from China with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Measurements. Prodorsum: length 280–300 , width 205–255 , height 110–130 , setae: ss 90 , ro 45–50 , in 100–115 , le 65–75 , ex 13 , mutual distance: in–in 100–105 , le–le 55–60 , ro–ro 40–45 ; notogaster: length 530–640 , width 400–435 , height 440–475 ; c 1 75 , c 2 65–75 , c 3 60–65 , c p 65–75 , d 1 60–65 , d 2 55–60 ,
e 1 60
–70,
e 2 60
–70, h 1 60–65 , h 2 60 , h 3 60–75 , ps 1 70–75 , ps 2 60–65 , ps 3 60–65 , mutual distance: c 1 – d 1 160 , d 1 – e 1 195–210 , e 1 – h 1 130 , h 1 – ps 1 130–145 ; genito-aggenital plate 210 × 80 , ano-adanal plate 280 × 70 .

Colour light brown; surface of prodorsum with irregular sculpture, notogaster covered with polygonal reticulation; prodorsum abruptly humped near insertion level of rostral setae in lateral view; one pair of long and strong lateral carinae present, with short and downward forks at the level of lamellar setae; sensilla with swollen and distinct head, covered with small spines distally; prodorsal setae robust, rigid and barbed in distal half, except exobothridial setae; notogastral setae fairly short, similar in shape as lamellar setae; vestigial setae f 1 not observed; 9 pairs of minute genital setae present, including 1 pair of setae inserted on progenital area; 2 pairs of aggenital setae located longitudinally; tarsi of legs I bidactylous, tarsi II–IV heterotridactylous.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 5.
Acrotritia koreensis
(Mahunka, 1997)
: A, lateral view of body (legs removed); B, prodorsum, dorsal view; C, sensillum, dorsal view; D, ventral plate; E, sculpture of prodorsum; F, sculpture of notogaster; G–J, trochanter, femur, genu and tibia: G, leg I; H, leg II; I, leg III; J, leg IV. Scale bars: A=100 µm; B–J=50 µm.
